description.value: As a Free Action,the Sister can choose one foe and spend a Fate Point to grant themselves and all allies within Willpower Bonus metres to gain the Hatred Talent for that kind of foe until the end of the encounter. EG: Targeting an Ork Nob would give Hatred (Orks).
